description: What you put on first can set the tone for your entire workout. That’s why it’s important to have underwear that feels like it was designed just for you. Our Men’s Intraknit™ 6" Boxer Brief has a slim fit that moves exactly with your body, minimal seams to help prevent chafing, and a soft fabric that helps manage moisture while keeping you cool. So even on the sweatiest workout, you can focus on only what’s important: amping that intensity to where you want it.
name: Smartwool Intraknit 6" Boxer Brief - Mens
